name: Viber
description:
A small game based on music and reaction time

Made during the global game jam of 2013

Funny story behind this project, is that halfway during the jam, one of the jurors who came looking at our progress, mentioned that our game looked almost identical to the winners of the year before. We never knew, never looked up the previous winners, we just went into this room and build our game. Turns out that the winners of the year before, where also using the same classroom as we where in. The people left, but the idea lingered around  O_O  

We didn't won the competition -_- 

Team : Deletables

  • 1 audio guy
  • 1 game designer
  • 2 programmers
  • 3 artists
